Translations.Text: Mazima twasenza abaana ba Israil mu kifo e kirungi ekyesiimisa netubagabirira mu bigabwa ebirungi, nebataba na njawukana (mu ddiini) okutuusa okumanya lwe kwabajjira (nti Nabbi Muhammad ajja kujja nga mubaka wa Katonda) mazima Katonda agenda kulamula wakati wa bwe ku lunaku lw'enkomerero mu ekyo kye baali baawukanamu

Bwoba nga olimu okubuusabuusa (Ggwe Muhammad) ku ebyo bye twassa gyoli buuza abo abaasoma e kitabo oluberyeberyelwo, ddala amazima gakujjidde okuva ewa Mukama omulabiriziwo kale togeza nga n'obeera mu babuusabuusa
Era ddala tobeeranga mu abo abalimbisa e bigambo bya Katonda n'obeera mu bafaafaganirwa
Mazima abo abaakakatako ekigambo kya Mukama omulabiriziwo tebagenda kukkiriza
Nebwebanajjirwa buli kabonero okutuusa lwe baliraba e bibonerezo ebiruma

Tewali bantu ba kitundu bakkiriza obukkiriza bwa bwe nebubagasa okugyako abantu ba Yunusu anti bwe bakkiriza twabaggyako ebibonerezo ebiswaza mu bulamu buno obw'ensi netubeeyagaza okutuusa ku ntuuko zaabwe
Singa Mukama omulabiriziwo yayagala abantu abali mu nsi bandikkirizza bonna, kaakati ggwe oyagala kukaka bantu bonna babeere bakkiriza
Tewali muntu ayinza kukikkiriza okugyako ngâ€™akkiriza lwa kwagala kwa Katonda, era Katonda assa ekibi ku abo abatategeera
Bagambe nti: mwetegereze ebiri mu ggulu (omusanvu) n'ensi naye obubonero n'okutiisa tebigasa bantu batakkiriza
Abaffe balina kye balindirira mpozzi ekifaananako ne nnaku zaabo abaabakulembera., bagambe nti: mulindirire nange ndi wamu na mmwe mu balindirira
Oluvanyuma ne tuwonya (ne tutaasa) ababaka baffe n'abo abakkiriza bwe tutyo nno bulijjo kikakafu kuffe okutaasa abakkiriza
